metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5748 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
qemu/qemu_monitor.c in libvirt allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (memory consumption) via a large QEMU reply.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5748` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirt-bin - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.26
libvirt0 - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.26
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libvirt package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.26').
